author: joyce
msg: CLIMATE-202 - Prevent PreviewMap overlays from hiding on scroll
Add worldCopyJump setting to PreviewMap directive initialization.

author: joyce
msg: CLIMATE-201 - Prevent Leaflet map overlays from hiding on scroll
- Add worldCopyJump attribute to LeafletMap directive initialization.
When the user scrolls an overlay off the screen it will be redrawn on
the appropriate region when it enters the view.
